https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1zS52jL8K7vq2j0vkTRSBw6hy4k.jpg A rare chance to experience a live-action childrenâ€™s movie made in Korea. An elementary student name Jingu can no longer stay with his parents and comes to live in a temple of young monks, but he is shy and does not get along with the others. Then one day someone breaks in and steals a statue and the altar portrait. As the only one who witnessed the crime, Jingu sets off with the other young monks to catch the thieves. Action Dongja
